story.title: Our story
story.content:
Founded in 2018, African Development Network (RAD) was born from the vision of creating a local player capable of meeting the growing needs of the mining industry and infrastructure development in West Africa.

Since our beginnings, we have evolved from a mining services company to a multi-sector group covering construction, logistics, international trade, training and technical services.

Today, RAD is recognized as a trusted partner by the largest companies operating on the continent, thanks to our technical expertise, international network and commitment to excellence.
